originalText.text:
I got my gc using them
, I'm a us citizen now, but they helped me through all my process
, highly recommended them

text.text:
I got my gc using them
, I'm a us citizen now, but they helped me through all my process
, highly recommended them

originalText.text: Best Immigration team!! Shankar handled my h1b case. He was always very easy to speak to and quickly answered any questions I had. He told us what we needed and took care of preparing and filing all of the h1 transfer paperwork. I especially appreciated how thoroughly he prepared for my petition. I felt extremely well prepared and that helped alot to relieve our initial anxiety. At the interview everything went very smoothly and my petition got approved without any issue. Shankar is an excellent immigration lawyer and I will definitely recommend him to anyone needing a help with immigration.

originalText.text:
I have been working with Simin H Syed PC for last few years and my experience has been fantastic. They took care of my H1 and now GC through marriage. Shankar is great experienced person and Fatima was a great help answering millions of questions on forms etc and always reachable over phone and on emails. Without them, I could not have gotten any approval. Also I would like to thank Azeema for taking care of my H1 processing and approval. This law firm has a great team who works with you and answers all the questions. I highly recommend them. Thank you for every help all these years.

-Chandra

originalText.text:
We are quite fortunate to have found Simin H Syed PC law firm to represent us in all our immigration cases. Me and my husband have been using their services past 5 years. Shankar and his team are quite professional and compassionate, kind, understanding and always kept us up-to-date with all information related to our immigration case.

I would highly recommend this firm to anyone for any immigration related work.

They will definitely be on your side, that is for sure!

originalText.text:
I have been working with them for last 6 years and finally received my green card. It was an excellent experience. All the associates were helpful and were good in communication. They communicated immediately if anything was needed and also had clarity in understanding of the process. Definitely many thanks to Shankar Shetty who has a tremendous amount of experience with Immigration and can answer the queries right away. He had gone beyond his call of duty to answer some of my questions which were not related to my case. Also thanks to Fatima Alo who worked on my case mostly and provided immediate assistance and clarification whenever needed. Definitely a good Attorney group to work with.

regards
Arun
